item.title: Spring Analysis
item.description: JDBC的简单操作 JdbcTemplate query queryForObject queryForList update execute ####事务抽象的核心接口 - PlatformTransactionManager - DataSourceTransactionManager - HibernateTransactionManager - JtaTransactionManger - TransactionDefition - Propagation - Isolation - Timeout - Read-only status
